interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Annie Soft Twist Rollers 7" 10 pcs Purple, Perfect for styling your hair, hair style, perm, rods, curls, hair curl, hair perm, long hair, curly hair, straight hair, for all hair types, flex rods, soft material Review Date: 2015/09/07 Store: Annie Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Flexi Rod', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Brand': 'Annie', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 4.53 x 1.57 inches; 4 Ounces'} Review Text: These are the best jumbo bendy rollers/Flexi rods I have ever used ! They are so easy to use and give such gorgeous waves (Just like what you would get if you had done a rollerset on your hair). You get those gorgeous, wide, spiral curls that would compliment anyone. They bend quite easily, which is a surprise since I have heard jumbo flexi rods are difficult to bend. You do have to have long hair in order to use them properly.
It will also hold better if you have thick hair with texture to it. Bone straight hair won't hold too well. I highly recomment these, there are my new faves ! Review Title: The best bendy rollers/Flexi rods I have ever used ! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Proclaim Open Top Mesh Wrap Proclaim ['For those times when you need to protect the edges of your style, the Proclaim Style It Up Open Top Mesh Wrap is ideal. This wrap has an open top and a Velcro fastener and is designed to cover the edges of your hair, leaving the crown open. The breathable material lets your hair get enough air and stay controlled without being smothered.'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 4 x 0.1 inches; 1 Pounds', 'UPC': '019663378166', 'Manufacturer': 'Proctor & Gamble'} Even though I have to be careful not to let my long hair get caught in the Velcro closure I really like this mesh wrap because it makes cross wrapping so much easier, I like to use this to keep my hair in place...it's better than sleeping with duck clips in your hair. great for cross wrapping hair La Femme Blush-on Rouge-Russet La Femme {'Brand': 'La Femme', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette'} I was expecting it to be matte but instead it's full of sparkles, which I hate. It's also too powdery, which makes a mess everywhere if you are not careful. this also causes you to use too much product...in the end wasting so much of it. The colours are pretty, but way lighter than what I expected. It's an okay product. Not surprised, when you look at the price it is sold for. It's an okay product (very powdery, the colours are lighter than expected) Soft'n Style Large Butterfly Clamps, 12 Count Soft 'N Style ['Large butterfly clamps which is perfect for separating long or short hair and \xa0great for hot rollers.'] {'Brand': "Soft 'N Style", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Unit Count': '12 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 3 x 2 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '186B', 'UPC': '524883549628 767485035766 755332353774 882341400929 748616604990 884896789726 087768000039', 'Manufacturer': "Soft'n Style"} I have had them for the past 3 years and they are still as good as new. They hold my thick hair in place, perfectly. They are really good quality. I would recommend them. Great product, still as good as new after 3 years La Femme Blush-on Rouge-Sienna La Femme {'Brand': 'La Femme', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'UPC': '796433017981'} It's lighter than I what I expected but it's a very pretty color. I very much like it. The only problem is that it's very loose and can cause quite a mess if not careful. Very pretty color (3 Pack) NYX Butter Lipstick - Licorice {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Cream', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'UPC': '712395476239'} This colour is very pretty, my mother and I love it so much Love NYX lipsticks. It's very soft and moisturizing, hence the name butter lipstick. Would definitely recommend. Beautiful colour NYX Liq Suede LipstickVintage, 1 Count NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP {'Brand': 'NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Cream, Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 0.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0800897840327', 'Manufacturer': 'Nyx'} This colour is so beautiful ! I was looking for something similar to Anastasia Beverly hills lipsticks (can't spend $30 on a lipstick). This was sold for cheaper. It looks a lot like Vamp from ABH. It's a gorgeous matte colour. It has become one of my favorite ! Gorgeous colour ! Annie Soft Twist Rollers 7" 10 pcs Purple, Perfect for styling your hair, hair style, perm, rods, curls, hair curl, hair perm, long hair, curly hair, straight hair, for all hair types, flex rods, soft material Annie {'Item Form': 'Flexi Rod', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Brand': 'Annie', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 4.53 x 1.57 inches; 4 Ounces'} These are the best jumbo bendy rollers/Flexi rods I have ever used ! They are so easy to use and give such gorgeous waves (Just like what you would get if you had done a rollerset on your hair). You get those gorgeous, wide, spiral curls that would compliment anyone. They bend quite easily, which is a surprise since I have heard jumbo flexi rods are difficult to bend. You do have to have long hair in order to use them properly.
It will also hold better if you have thick hair with texture to it. Bone straight hair won't hold too well. I highly recomment these, there are my new faves ! The best bendy rollers/Flexi rods I have ever used !
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus**: The user is committed to effective hair management, seeking products that enhance styling versatility while minimizing damage. Their recent purchase reflects a preference for tools that can create beautiful waves, showcasing an interest in achieving high-quality hairstyles effortlessly.

- **Preference for Functionality**: They value practical and user-friendly solutions that simplify styling processes and maintain hair integrity. The satisfaction expressed in their recent experience with flexible styling tools underscores this aspect.

- **Material Sensitivity**: Breathable and soft materials remain a priority, emphasizing comfort and hair health during styling and overnight maintenance.

- **Positive Experience with Velcro and Flexi Rods**: Their appreciation for adjustable and versatile products has expanded to include bendable rollers, indicating a strong inclination towards items that can easily adapt to different hair types and facilitate beautiful results.

- **Sleep Compatibility**: Solutions that ensure comfort during sleep continue to be important, as they look to maintain hairstyles overnight.

- **Cosmetic Preferences**: The user's discerning taste in cosmetics leans toward well-performing, soft, and moisturizing options, while they express a preference for striking matte finishes over sparkly, messy formulations, maintaining their focus on affordability without compromising quality.

- **Quality Endorsement**: They prioritize durability and functionality in both hair and cosmetic tools, reflecting a commitment to reliability in their beauty routine.

Overall, the user demonstrates a consistent preference for practical, comfortable, and durable beauty products that enhance aesthetics while being mindful of usability and hair health.
